_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Stingray Debian-Firefox
author: regulad@outlook.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Stingray Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=stingray

cd /mnt/server
curl -o runtime-bash.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/regulad/stingray/master/stingray.py
chmod +x stingray.py

mkdir .vnc
cd ./.vnc
curl -o xstartup https://raw.githubusercontent.com/regulad/stingray/master/stingray/debian-firefox/xstartup
chmod +x xstartup

variables.name: VNC Password
variables.description: The password to be used for connecting to the VNC server. The user is always "container".

variables.name: Websockify Version
variables.description: The version of websockify to use.

variables.name: VNC Desktop Width
variables.description: The width of the VNC desktop.

variables.name: VNC Desktop Height
variables.description: The height of the VNC desktop.
